description:
The Advanced European Union ("AEU" for short) is one of the three major world powers in 2307 AD. While in name it`s the European Union, in reality it also controls the African continent, including having military presence there and owning the orbital elevator in Africa.
As of 2307 AD, the AEU`s orbital elevator is still not completed but in operational status. However, it has developed a new type of mobile suit capable of drawing energy from the orbital elevator, starting with the AEU Enact. The new MS technology is part of AEU`s new military expansionism objective.
name: Shin Europa Kyoudoutai
